title: Horror Overseas (Ep 1804)
description:
Terrible news out of Japan as this major political figure is assassinated. In this episode, I address what went wrong, and why it may happen again. 

News Picks:

Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe shot dead at campaign event.


Biden Sold a Million Barrels From US Strategic Petroleum Reserve to China-Owned Gas Giant.

Newsom Admits State Paid for His Security Detail's Travel to Montana, Laughably Claims 'Public Safety' Exception to Law.

Biden staffers left White House in year one at higher rate than Trump and Obama.

When will the media give up this laughable 'disinformation' beat?

Nuclear war would trigger a new Ice Age, study warns.

Biden administration to make sweeping changes to student loan system.


Copyright Bongino Inc All Rights Reserved
